about_the_game:
Taivas is a mysterious action roguelite, Dead Cells, rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired. set in a world of myth, and a time of magic. The destiny of a Canidae Kingdom rests on the shoulders of a young fox alike boy. His name… Joakim.

Use spells and special powers and weapons to explore, destroy and fight your way to the UpWorld, and even beyond...

Story:


You are Joakim, a young fox alike boy with fluffy tail and large, pointed ears, Knight of the Kingdom of Canidae. Kingdom has lived in peace for a long, long time, but now all kind of creatures are attacking against the Kingdom. Advisor to the Monarchy, magician Mikio sends you to a dangerous travel to the UpWorld. You start your journey from a middle of the Earth and start your journey to the surface, and beyond...

Features on a Demo:

Demo game currently offers one quite small but fun level! (cave)
Save & Load function
1 Boss
1 Skill
0 special powers
This First version offers 15-30 minutes fun

Game is in development, and there will be a lots of improvements to the current character, new enemies, new levels...
